website_summaries.verdict: These feminine, stylish shoes look great and are supportive enough for casual runs.
pros: Comes in Ash Pearl, Gray Three and Mystery Ruby
Air mesh and synthetic upper, mid-foot saddle, lace-up closure, front pull tab
cons: Thin toebox mesh allows some toes to show through, so socks are necessary

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a glove for your feet.
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove. Top of heel slightly leans forward. Isn’t too small but due to the design feels snug. Just would’ve been nice to know. If they don’t fall apart quick then I’d change it to a 5 star. Time for a run to check performance.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Loveeeee
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them for the gym and running! I read they'd be a little bigger so I went ahead and ordered a whole size smaller than what I usually wear. When I got them they were a little small but now that I've worn them a few times they've stretched out a bit and fit perfectly!😊
customer_reviews.author: Makiah Lemmer

customer_reviews.title: Comfiest shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to the gym every day and theyre the only shoes I've ever owned that have good support without being bulky. Double points for how cute they are!! I get complimented regularly on these bad boys! I do a lot of endurance and strength training and used to switch between shoes dependnfg on which I was doing- these stand up for both! Best shoe purchase I've ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: These have a pretty wide toe box for my narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: These have a pretty wide toe box for my narrow feet, and they ate my socks the first time I went for a run but I didn't end up with blisters or hot spots. Since then they've been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful

customer_reviews.title: They are true to size!
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't sure what size to get because a lot of people were saying they run small and to get a half size up. I've had Adidas in the past and they were always true to size for me, so I went with a few other reviewers and got my size. I'm glad I did!! I will say if you have a wider foot to maybe go up a size or look for wides. If they don't have them in wides then I probably wouldn't get them. They're slender, but I have slender feet so they fit nice for me. I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: C. Reader V

customer_reviews.title: My favorites!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair because I got so many compliments on the first. I run, do bootcamps and Orangetheory with them. They hold up great and are super comfy. Normally I put an insole in my shoes for extra cushioning and arch support, these I never really felt like I needed that. They are neutral support so if you pronate severely I would not recommend. The toe box though is roomy and soft so if you have any toe issues these are great.
customer_reviews.author: ljm

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fits like a glove. Only issue is I tend to have heel slippage and the shoe doesn't have the extra holes to allow you to lace it higher up to help prevent slipping. Undecided on whether I'll keep these or not... It's definitely more of a casual fashion shoe than an actual running shoe so I may be able to deal with slight looseness in the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Gimbel

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Does not run small. Buy your shoe size! Gym Lover
customer_reviews.author: Kflowa

customer_reviews.title: I just got these and so far I love them. The color is gorgeous and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got these and so far I love them. The color is gorgeous and they are super comfortable! I tried a different color edge lux pair on at the store to make sure these would fit and they fit exactly as the store pair did. I usually wear an 8.5 in Nike (I think they run on the small side) and an 8 in all other shoes and purchased these in an 8 and they fit perfectly. I work in a hospital and am on my feet most of the day and will update this review after a few shifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Mariah

customer_reviews.title: beautiful sleek running and/or walking sneaker with great support and ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful sleek running and/or walking sneaker with great support and comfort. I feel very in style when I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Muriel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, good quality, wide and perfect for the gym/running.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cheap insole and really hard to keep clean.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the aesthetic, but the original insole is atrociously uncomfortable and the material picks up and holds dirt and stains unbelievably fast. Had to buy doctor scholls insoles, and stain treat and machine wash already. Look cool, but really hard to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So incredibly comfortable. I wouldn't recommend running on wet pavement though
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchase and saw that they ran somewhat small and I should order up half a size. I usually wear an 8.5 and ordered a 9. They fit perfectly. So incredibly comfortable. I wouldn't recommend running on wet pavement though, I slipped quite a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Bell

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes aesthetically
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes aesthetically. I've received lots of compliments. They're a bit snug in the toe though which is unusual for Adidas sneakers. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. I’ve got high arches so the opening is a bit snug to fit in initially. Memory foam insole comfortable as I’m on my feet all day. Bought two pairs so I can alternate them between cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Lilygeenz

customer_reviews.title: Adidas small as usual, but still a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and mostly comfortable, but in true Adidas fashion, they run small and narrow. There is rubbing on the outside of my pinky toe and I don't have wide feet nor any issues like bunions or corns. I would still recommend though.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Good for wide
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to keep these shoes because they are cute, but had to return due to being too small. I have other Adidas in a 7, however these were too small. I may reorder in a half a size to a whole size up. Good for wide feet
customer_reviews.author: likewise111

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe and very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this shoe, it is very comfortable. I've worn it several times for running and working out, it feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes for Wide, Flat Feet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit for someone who wears a size 11. Hugs my feet perfectly. I have wide flat feet so these shoes are a gem! Great arch support. Able to withstand 45 min to 1 hour of running!
customer_reviews.author: Sioux4me

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, comfy, and NO SHIN SPLINTS!
customer_reviews.text: Love these...and you can’t beat the price! They seemed a little tight at first but I broke them in after just a few workouts. Plus my feet are a little wide so I expected them to feel a little tight at first. A lot of times I have terrible shin splints from running and I’ve literally thrown away new shoes because they’ve made my shin splints worse. So far no shin splints with these, which is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Just got them today and fit is perfect. Very comfy. Cant wait to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Super comfy to wear during my workouts
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes and very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The shoes is very nice and lightweight but unfortunately it’s too small and not wide enough.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Runs half a size smaller than my other Edge Lux. The material is also not the same. Something to think about. I do like the Edge Lux obviously because I purchased another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Barth

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the style, they are true to size and are super comfortable. Have worn them all day with no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: VeeCee

customer_reviews.title: like them but a bit tight ob upper foot area
customer_reviews.text: Ok.like them but a bit tight ob upper foot area.
customer_reviews.author: Moira

customer_reviews.title: Love everything else about them
customer_reviews.text: I am 8.5 with narrow foot, but had to go to 9.5 for these shoes. Love everything else about them! Worth the size switch.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend to
customer_reviews.text: Conforatable, lightweight and size was on point. Item is exaclty as in picture. Definitely would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Hector E.

customer_reviews.title: I went up a half size and they are way ...
customer_reviews.text: I went up a half size and they are way tighter and snug compared to my other ones. I would go up a whole size.
customer_reviews.author: MANB

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as everyone described
customer_reviews.text: Not as great as everyone described. but tight fitting and light weight. stayed on well mountain climbers on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Webber

customer_reviews.title: Order half size up
customer_reviews.text: Order half size up, otherwise you will have pain in your feets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Far too small. I'm typically a 9 and I couldn't get my foot all the way in. I had to check and make sure I didn't accidentally receive a pair of 6 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Havens

customer_reviews.title: Cute comfy shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors, good fit and they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I love the fit and the style
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and the style. I am a true walker and a beginner runner; these shoes are more than comfortable and are meeting my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sneaker didn’t fit well.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sneaker, but did not fit well. Was able to return the sneaker. And was given a full refund. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Linda Watson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for high volume gym activity
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort and the resilience. These are my workout shoes
customer_reviews.author: KRC

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe,  but size up
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, but get a 1/2 size bigger than your usual fit
customer_reviews.author: Drmusicmd

customer_reviews.title: they did not feel late at first, but as ...
customer_reviews.text: they did not feel late at first, but as im wearing them they stretch and have become sloppy on my feet... zero support and can not tighten properly
customer_reviews.author: Dr kimberly

customer_reviews.title: good one exactly what i expected for
customer_reviews.text: good one exactly what i expected for , even better
customer_reviews.author: nino

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Wide toe box, low arch, good support. I have three pair of edge lux 2.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, cute and simple
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Light weight, comfortable. I wear them for day to day activities.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Long

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: i looove these shoes. Great fit and quality, and look great on.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Farley

customer_reviews.title: Not for wet weather
customer_reviews.text: I really like having the shoe laces start higher which gives my toes more room to stretch while i run. These shoes are not made for any type of wet weather. I live in seattle and will not be able to wear them any time there is a small amount of water on the ground. Went running in a very VERY light drizzle and my feet were soaked from a short 2 mile run. After they dried wore them walking through the parking lot and they started to soak through my toes again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Light And comfy
customer_reviews.text: The orange was a little darker than expected but I love them. Light and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Cools

customer_reviews.title: These are 100% true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why reviewers are saying otherwise. I have been running for 20 years and have tried on every running shoe imaginable at one point or another. These fit exactly true to size. That said, they feel like a light trainer to me. Not a shoe designed for running. No extra holes to lace them up to prevent heel slippage etc. Decent enough for the gym but not for serious training runs or races.
customer_reviews.author: Vicktoria

customer_reviews.title: They are great! Great price
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were exactly what I expected! They are great! Great price, nice looking shoes, and speedy shipping! Thanks for the pleasant purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: How can I return them for a bigger size. I didn’t get a return box or sticker. Great shoes just to small
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Order a 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.text: I’m consistently an 8.5. These are a 1/4 inch too small. I’m a server, so I regret not returning for a 9 because I wear them so often with fast walking speed. But, they are incredibly attractive sneakers. Not as slip resistant as other sneakers I’ve used in restaurants.
customer_reviews.author: Nat&Jon

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They fit great. I am between a 8 1/2 and a 9 and was not sure what to order. I went through and read the reviews and ordered a 9 and I am glad I did. I would defiantly order up if you are between sizes. They hug your feet like a dream and are super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: best shoe
customer_reviews.text: the size was perfect and the fit was too. i wear these to workout and walk to class. perfect everyday wear!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Siemers

customer_reviews.title: Winners for sure though very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute shoe order a halfsize bigger than usual though. I had to return 8 1/2 flute a 9. Winners for sure though very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: brenna

customer_reviews.title: Shoe runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Reviews said shoes were a little tight but true to size. I'm a size 12 womens...I would need at least a 13 in this shoe. Was disappointed in the fit. Shoe is very light...if sizing was better...might be a better review.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Other than that they look great and are comfortable while working out
customer_reviews.text: The right shoe is a little tighter than the left one. Other than that they look great and are comfortable while working out.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Seay

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these Adidas Running Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: What is there not to love about these running shoes? I have a wide foot and bought 1/2 size larger than my normal shoe size. They are very light weight and comfortable while running and doing cardio dance classes. I will definitely purchase this shoe again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight good looking durable running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for my Grand daughter. She just had to have these ! She loves the style ! Very light weight !
customer_reviews.author: Trixbus

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the cutest shoes I own! Cuter in person even! They are a bit small though, I’d order a half size up if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter and she loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Seale

customer_reviews.title: liked the design on line on pictures but in reality ...
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable sneaker and very heavy .. liked the design on line on pictures but in reality not my thing
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: would like to return.. they are too big could not print our return label before it closed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: adidas Performance Women's Edge Lux 2
product_meta.description: Designed for a woman's foot, these women's running shoes are built from a bounce midsole for energy-filled comfort with every step. Sock-like construction provides a snug fit.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Runner type: neutral; Weight: 7.3 ounces (size 7); Midsole drop: 10 mm
BOUNCE cushioning provides enhanced comfort and flexibility
Mesh upper offers maximum breathability; Graphic for standout look
Attached tongue and thin lacing system provides sock-like feel; Mesh lining offers breathability; Motion capture technology used for a women's-specific fit
